title: Hospitality Competency Enhancement: Analysis of Learning Analytics (LA) Adoption Factors and the ICAP Framework

context.prior_knowledge: Basic pedagogical theory and digital tool utilization experience
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Instructional design principles based on the ICAP framework (Active/Constructive/Interactive/Passive Learning) can be applied to LA (Learning Analytics) adoption cases
The impact of teachers' knowledge, awareness, and self-regulatory competencies on their intention to adopt LA can be analyzed
At least three factors predicting the effectiveness of LA tools in online learning environments can be identified
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
